name: Ghost Postponed
description:
You've awoken in a strange world as a... ghost?!?

Explore a mysterious forest, talk to others and help them and yourself through problems they face.

Ghost Postponed was developed in under 48 hours for the Wholesome Games GameJam. Due to unexpected conflicts with time and resources, we were reduced to a two person team with not enough time left to finish the project. 

Despite this, we feel our efforts and world is something we want to share with everyone.
The characters of this place are something special - we're more than happy to expand and complete this game in the near future if there is enough interest. 

If you like what you see, please be sure to let us know on Twitter @tinywaregames

What can you do in Ghost Postponed?

Right now you can 

- Explore a beautiful and mysterious forest

- Jump with an adorable *squeak*

- Talk to two NPC's in the forest

- Respond to their dialogue and enter branching conversations

CREDITS
Game Dev - Michael Pearce

Music & Sound - Giant Peach Audio

Additional Credits

UE4 Marketplace - "interactive Open World Foliage"
